heroSection.line2: I'm Johan, a Software Engineer passionate about crafting user-friendly web apps. Check out my work below!

aboutMe.phrase1: üìö I initially stopped studying after completing a Technological Baccalaureate. From odd jobs to odd jobs, I quickly realized that this context would not be enough for me. So, at the age of 21, I decided to resume my studies and pursue a degree in e-commerce.
aboutMe.phrase2: üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è These studies allowed me to work as an SEO specialist for 6 years. This experience taught me about the functioning of the professional world, teamwork, the weight of responsibilities, as well as managing a back office and search engine optimization.
aboutMe.phrase3: üçÄ As a SEO specialist, working closely with developers sparked my interest in this highly technical field. Therefore, I enrolled in a 6-month bootcamp training program to acquire the fundamentals of web programming and coding. Following that, I continued my learning journey through an apprenticeship program, pursuing a degree in Web and Mobile Applications Integration/Development with a specialization in React and Node.js.
aboutMe.phrase4: üçæ Since then, I have worked with several companies on complete integrations, provided assistance to deliver projects on time, made modifications, and added new features...
aboutMe.phrase5: üë∑ Today, drawing strength from my journey, I master the intricacies of the Agile methodology, the principles of Clean Code, and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring optimal scalability and maintainability for each web application I develop. My diverse experience, spanning from SEO to programming, enables me to bring a unique perspective to every project.
aboutMe.phrase6: üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è As a Web Developer since 2020, I thoroughly enjoy working with Nuxt & NextJs in an Agile environment, adhering to clean code principles, and implementing CI/CD pipelines. I take pleasure in transforming mockups of various styles into dynamic and interactive websites to enhance the user experience.

items.title: Software engineer
items.description: As a frontend developer at Winter Energies, I create modern, high-performance user interfaces with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, contributing to sustainable energy consumption by delivering scalable and reliable solutions.

items.title: Software engineer
items.description: Building robust real estate management software to streamline operations and enhance efficiency for independent real estate agents.

items.title: Freelance Developer
items.description: Delivering tailor-made solutions to clients, ensuring their unique needs are met with high-quality development expertise.

items.title: Front-End Developer
items.description: Crafting engaging and user-friendly front-end experiences for clients, helping them achieve their online presence goals.

items.title: Front-end & Back-end Developer
items.description: Insurance brokerage website that allows you to quickly compare offers from different insurers. Once the visitor fills out the form, their information is sent via an API to a CRM to manage the new client's file.

items.title: Web Analyst (6 years)
items.description: Providing insights and optimizations to maximize website performance and drive business growth through data-driven strategies.

items.company: Large Retail Chains | Garden Centers | Animation
items.title: Various jobs in different fields
items.description: Acquired versatile skills and valuable experience by working in diverse roles across multiple industries.

contact.phrase: Feel free to reach out to me via email for collaborations or inquiries.
